channel.title: Benton|Mono County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Benton|Mono County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: CA-120 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-120 west. Distance to US-395, Lee Vining, and Yosemite. CA-120 is open to US-395. This stretch of CA-120 is closed during the winter months.

item.title: US-6 West at CA-120 West
item.description: US-6 West at CA-120 West. Use CA-120 west for Lee Vining, Yosemite East Gate, and Yosemite National Park. Continue west on US-6 for Bishop.

item.title: End CA-120 East at US-6
item.description: End CA-120 east at US-6. Use US-6 west for Bishop; US-6 east for Tonopah (Nevada).

item.title: US-6 West at CA-120 West
item.description: US-6 West at CA-120 West. Use CA-120 west for Lee Vining, Yosemite East Gate, and Yosemite National Park. Continue west on US-6 for Bishop.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching CA-120
item.description: US-6 west approaching CA-120 west to Lee Vining.
